role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: That is repulsive...
example.text: In an attempt to disgust and *-1 repulse these vile oppressors, I-1 once again induced myself to vomit on their favorite chair.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'repulse' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN.Verbnet entry 31.1, other framed members include comfort, convince, encourage, interest, reassure, scare, shock, spook, threaten, worry.Comparison with 'repel.'
